Is this part of the recent CoolBar work?

Created an attachment (id=7172)
Patch for CoolBarManager.java

Apply the patch to coolBarManager.java in org.eclipse.jface.action package

Although I cannot duplicate this bug, I have made the 
CoolBarManager.updateTabOrder method more robust to handle null entries. This 
should fix the problem. The patch also fixes issues with stack trace dumps 
appearing in the console instead of the log file.
